actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 170 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to revise and make permanent the provisions for allowing a deduction for contributions for conservation purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an income tax deduction for the contribution of an interest, a remainder interest, or a restricted interest in real property (other than a mineral interest) to a tax-exempt organization for conservation purposes.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 170 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to revise and make permanent the provisions for allowing a deduction for contributions for conservation purposes.
